posts.title: Performance
posts.excerpt: Quote:Performance is a 1970 British crime drama film directed by Donald Cammell and Nicolas Roeg, written by Cammell and starring James Fox and Mick Jagger of The Rolling Stones, in his film acting debut. The film was produced in 1968 but not released until 1970. Cammell was heavily influenced by the Argentinian writer Jorge Luis …

posts.title: Capturing the Friedmans
posts.excerpt: A Sundance Grand Jury prize-winner and a true conversation starter, Capturing the Friedmans travels into one apparently ordinary Long Island family’s heart of darkness. Arnold and Elaine Friedman had a normal life with their three sons until Arnold was arrested on multiple (and increasingly lurid) charges of child abuse. Because the Friedmans had documented their …

posts._title: Ulrich Köhler & Henner Winckler – Das freiwillige Jahr AKA A Voluntary Year (2019)
posts.title: Das freiwillige Jahr
posts.excerpt: Urs is a single doctor who looks after his alcoholic brother Falk. Trying to prevent his daughter Jette from getting stuck in their little province, he persuades her to volunteer in South America.

posts._title: Johan van der Keuken – Het Witte Kasteel AKA The White Castle (1973)
posts.title: Het Witte Kasteel
posts.excerpt: Het Witte Kasteel (1973) Part of Johan van der Keuken’s North/South series, The White Castle focuses on the impact of the West on the underclass: on the concrete realities of their daily life and on the way their existence is isolated and frustrated. Interweaving images of the Spanish tourist mecca of Formentera, a community center …

posts.title: Tarantula (1955)
posts.excerpt: In the Arizona desert, Professor Gerald Deemer is experimenting with growth hormones in the hopes of finding a way to increase the world’s food supply. His partner in the project was recently found dead in the desert, suffering from a disease that normally takes years to advance but in his case seems to have afflicted …

posts.title: Codice d’amore orientale
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Yawalak e Sailuk, a girl and a boy fallen in love respectively with other persons, in order to avoid marriages established by their parents against their owns feelings, leave the native village and wander through wild areas until they reach a ruined temple. posts.title: Janine
posts.excerpt: Janine (1962) Two men are disappointed by women and united by a whore.

posts.title: 1er amour
posts.excerpt: 1er amour (2013) Antoine, 13, spends the summer vacation with his parents in a rented cottage on an island in the middle of the Saint-Lawrence River. posts._title: Jack Saltman – Waldheim: A Commission of Inquiry (1988)
posts.title: Waldheim: A Commission of Inquiry
posts.excerpt: This Documentary examines the wide- spread allegations that Kurt Waldheim committed war crimes during World War II.Waldheim was an Austrian diplomat and politician. Waldheim was the fourth Secretary-General of the United Nations from 1972 to 1981, and the ninth President of Austria from 1986 to 1992., The evidence is presented before a panel of five …

posts._title: Ettore Scola – Che ora è? aka What Time is it? (1989)
posts.title: Che ora è?
posts.excerpt: Marcello (Marcello Mastroianni) has worked hard all his life to achieve a certain standing and success as a lawyer in Rome. He is pleased to be able to offer the fruits of his success to his son Michele (Massimo Troisi), and is perplexed and distressed that his unambitious son has no interest in any of …
